definition: diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

pinyin: tu2 xing2 yong4 hu4 jie4 mian4

sentences.english: In the article 50 Totally Free Lessons in Graphic Design Theory the TutsPlus family definitely delivers with a bevy of knowledge building lessons in theory
sentences.chinese: 50节图形设计免费课程将教授你大量的理论知识。

sentences.english: LCD screen display, man-machine dialogue, graphic display interface.
sentences.chinese: 液晶屏幕显示，人机对话，图形显示界面。

sentences.english: The encoding rules are very flexible and support the representation of data graphs and polymorphism.
sentences.chinese: 编码规则非常灵活并支持图形数据和多态的表示。

sentences.english: Adds a sequence of connected cubic Bzier curves to the current figure.
sentences.chinese: 在当前图形中添加一系列相互连接的立方贝塞尔曲线。

sentences.english: We used a funnel plot to evaluate reports for publication bias.
sentences.chinese: 我们使用倒漏斗图形对出版偏倚的报道进行评价。

sentences.english: Thus, embodiments of a virtual local memory for a graphics processor are disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 这样，公开了图形处理器的虚拟本地存储器的实施例。

sentences.english: Figure 3. A sample customized menu of favorite commands.
sentences.chinese: 图形⒊一个定制喜爱命令的菜单样品。

sentences.english: It will also have more memory and a more powerful graphics processor, they said.
sentences.chinese: 它将拥有更多的内存以及更强大的图形处理器。

sentences.english: Installs redistributable merge modules and a set of graphics.
sentences.chinese: 安装可再发行的合并模块和一组图形。

sentences.english: You might also want to install a control panel for your graphic card .
sentences.chinese: 您可能还想为您的图形卡安装一个控制面板。

sentences.english: The bottle had a skull and crossbones symbol on it.
sentences.chinese: 瓶子上有骷髅和交叉的股骨图形。

sentences.english: Payment will be per info-graphic image.
sentences.chinese: 付款方式为每个信息，图形图像。

sentences.english: Each icon corresponds to a 16x16 pixels image.
sentences.chinese: 每个图标都是一副16x16像素的图形。

sentences.english: Use colours found in key photos or graphics on your web page for added harmony.
sentences.chinese: 用颜色或图形找到关键照片你网页续和谐。

sentences.english: Gaming development for portables and remotely processing graphics - how possible this is?
sentences.chinese: 为便携式和远程处理图形如何可能这是游戏开发？

sentences.english: Graphics should be described textually as far as possible.
sentences.chinese: 图形应尽可能以文字表达。
